results.name: If 2n = 2^e1 + ... + 2^ek [e1 .. ek distinct], then a(n) is the number of nonzero digits when A002110(e1) * ... * A002110(ek) is written in primorial base.
comment: Number of nonzero digits when A283477(n) is represented in primorial base, A049345.
Number of distinct prime factors in A324289(n).

program: A267263(n) = { my(s=0); forprime(p=2, , if(n%p, s++, if(n==0, return(s))); n\=p); }; \\ From A267263
